isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - TURN SIGNAL LENS ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Refer to Figure 65 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.
Remove 4 mounting screws (Item 1) securing the headlight bezel (Item 2) to the headlight/turn signal assembly (Item 3). Remove the headlight bezel from the headlight/turn signal assembly.
With the headlight bezel (Item 2) removed, remove the 2 mounting screws (Item 1, Figure 66), located in the upper and lower corners of the turn signal lens assembly (Item 2, Figure 66).

Once the 2 mounting screws are removed, rotate the turn signal lens assembly (Item 1, Figure 67) outward, away from the hood/fender assembly (Item 2, Figure 67). When the turn signal lens assembly reaches a certain point, it will pop out of the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket (Item 3, Figure 67).
Refer to Figure 68 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

If necessary, reach behind the headlight (Item 1) and pull the headlight/turn signal assembly wiring harness (Item 2) toward the outside of the hood/fender assembly (Item 3). This will allow the turn signal lens assembly (Item 4) to be pulled far enough away from the hood/fender assembly to reach the turn signal bulb socket (Item 5) and remove it from the turn signal lens assembly.
Once the turn signal bulb socket is removed, the turn signal bulb (Item 6) can be removed.
Repeat this procedure for the other turn signal lens assembly.

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (After July 1996) and 9100 (After March 1997) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 68for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: If removed, or replacing the turn signal bulb (Item 6), install the turn signal bulb into the turn signal bulb socket (Item 5).
Install the turn signal bulb socket into the turn signal lens assembly (Item 4).

Hold the turn signal lens assembly in position at the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket (Item 7). Line up the 2 guide pins (Item 1, Figure 69) on the turn signal lens assembly (Item 2, Figure 69) with the guide pin holes (Item 3, Figure 69) in the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket, then push the turn signal lens assembly into place on the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket.
Position the turn signal lens assembly (Item 2, Figure 66) in place and install the 2 mounting screws (Item 1, Figure 66), located in the upper and lower corners of the turn signal lens assembly.

Position the headlight bezel (Item 2, Figure 65) on the headlight/turn signal assembly (Item 3, Figure 65) and install 4 mounting screws (Item 1, Figure 65) securing the headlight bezel to the headlight/turn signal assembly.
Repeat this procedure for the other turn signal lens assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 67. 91/92/9400 Turn Signal Lens and Hood/Fender Assemblies
Figure 68. 91/92/9400 Hood/Fender and Turn Signal Assemblies
